data.actual_result: The letters I type in a different part of the text become capitalised, which is annoying.
data.expected_result: The letters I type in a different part of the text won’t become capitalised and I keep type normally.
data.short_description: When typing a message and having a new empty spot (pressing the “return” button), letters you are typing which are not on that line become capitalised.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any discord where you have permissions to send text messages - Type a sentence - Press the return button and don’t type anything there - Go back to the previous sentence and try to type other stuff, it should keep switching to capitalised letters.
